misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a notable figure hailing from Hirsala Golf, is known for his discerning palate and passion for fine wines. A true connoisseur, he appreciates the finer things in life, bringing a touch of elegance to the greens.

While Jaakko's dedication to the sport is unquestionable, his punctuality has been known to waver. Spectators might find themselves holding their breath, wondering if Jaakko will grace the tee on time. Despite this, his affable nature and undeniable talent always make his presence worthwhile.

Jaakko has participated in the Hector Trophée on three occasions and is expected to make his fourth appearance in the upcoming edition in 2025. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jaakko's commitment remains steadfast. With each passing year, he refines his technique, driven by an unwavering pursuit of excellence.
